Perform chest compressions.sentence: The rescuer positions the hands on the center of the patient's chest.
Perform chest compressions.subject: The rescuer

Perform chest compressions.sentence: The rescuer interlocks the fingers of one hand with the other.
Perform chest compressions.subject: The rescuer

Perform chest compressions.sentence: The rescuer straightens the arms and maintains a shoulder-width stance.
Perform chest compressions.subject: The rescuer

Perform chest compressions.sentence: The rescuer performs chest compressions by pushing down hard and fast at a rate of 100 to 120 compressions per minute.
Perform chest compressions.subject: The rescuer

Perform chest compressions.sentence: The rescuer allows the chest to fully recoil between compressions.
Perform chest compressions.subject: The rescuer
